body:
Could you compute the singular matrices here by calling svd?
Alternatively, could you make it more explicit that this is coming from svd_backward? something like "svd_backward: Setting compute_uv to false in torch.svd doesn't compute singular matrices, and hence we cannot compute backward. Please use torch.svd(compute_uv=True)"
